author: akritkbehera
body:
#### PR description:

This PR performs minor cleanup and header corrections across a few packages.

- Dropped #include "DataFormats/Math/interface/Vector3D.h" from files in PhysicsTools/CandUtils/interface/{EventShapeVariables.h,Thrust.h}, as its no longer required.
- Updated PhysicsTools/PatExamples/interface/BTagPerformance.h to explicitly include <cmath>
title: Fixes for failure due to HeaderConsistency scram b check-headers
